namespace = "idol.test/ns"
message {
	name = "RpcRequest"
}
message {
	name = "RpcResponse"
}
protocol {
	name = "Protocol_WithTags"
	rpc {
		name = "Rpc_A"
		tag = 1
		request_type = .MESSAGE
		request_type_name = "RpcRequest"
		response_type = .MESSAGE
		response_type_name = "RpcResponse"
	}
	rpc {
		name = "Rpc_B"
		tag = 2
		request_type = .MESSAGE
		request_type_name = "RpcRequest"
		request_is_stream = .true
		response_type = .MESSAGE
		response_type_name = "RpcResponse"
	}
	rpc {
		name = "Rpc_C"
		tag = 3
		request_type = .MESSAGE
		request_type_name = "RpcRequest"
		response_type = .MESSAGE
		response_type_name = "RpcResponse"
	}
	rpc {
		name = "Rpc_D"
		tag = 4
		request_type = .MESSAGE
		request_type_name = "RpcRequest"
		response_type = .MESSAGE
		response_type_name = "RpcResponse"
		response_is_stream = .true
	}
	rpc {
		name = "Rpc_E"
		tag = 5
		request_type = .MESSAGE
		request_type_name = "RpcRequest"
	}
	event {
		name = "Event_A"
		tag = 6
		payload_type = .MESSAGE
		payload_type_name = "RpcRequest"
	}
}
protocol {
	name = "Protocol_WithoutTags"
	rpc {
		name = "Rpc_A"
		request_type = .MESSAGE
		request_type_name = "RpcRequest"
		response_type = .MESSAGE
		response_type_name = "RpcResponse"
	}
	event {
		name = "Event_A"
		payload_type = .MESSAGE
		payload_type_name = "RpcRequest"
	}
}
